alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 7:30PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN SALINE AND SOUTHWESTERN GAGE COUNTIES... At 729 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Western to 5 miles east of Mahaska, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fairbury, Plymouth, Odell, Diller, Daykin, Endicott, Jansen, Reynolds, Steele City, Harbine, Alexandria State Recreation Area, Rock Creek Station State Historical Park, Cub Creek Recreational Area, Crystal Springs Campground, Buckley Creek Recreational Area and Camp Jefferson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
